text: Vinícius José Paixão de Oliveira Júnior (born 11 Setember 2001), commonly known as Vinícius Júnior or Vini Jr. (), is a moni Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Spanish club Real Madrid and the Brazil national team.
